trans-unit.source: Specifies the action to take when adding data to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and the required <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> is missing.
trans-unit.target: 指定要加入資料時所採取的動作<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>和必要<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>或<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>遺失。

trans-unit.source: The MissingSchemaAction values are used whenever an action is taken that could change the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 只要採取的動作會使用值 MissingSchemaAction 無法變更<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>的結構描述

trans-unit.source: Adds the necessary columns to complete the schema.
trans-unit.target: 加入必要的資料行，以完成結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Adds the necessary columns and primary key information to complete the schema.
trans-unit.target: 加入必要的資料行與主索引鍵的資訊完成結構描述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how primary key information is added to a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>, see <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema*>.To function properly with the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddWithKey" name="AddWithKey" href=""></xref> requires that the native OLE DB provider obtains necessary primary key information by setting the DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS property, and then determines which columns are primary key columns by examining DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN in the IColumnsRowset.
trans-unit.target: 如何主索引鍵資訊的詳細資訊加入至<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>，請參閱<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema*>。若要正常運作，而.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddWithKey" name="AddWithKey" href=""> </xref>需要原生 OLE DB 提供者藉由設定 DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS 屬性，取得必要的主索引鍵資訊，並接著會判斷哪些資料行是主索引鍵資料行，藉由檢查中 IColumnsRowset DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema*>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, the user may explicitly set the primary key constraints on each <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，使用者可能會明確設定每個 primary key 條件約束<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that incoming records that match existing records are updated instead of appended.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保符合現有記錄的內送記錄會更新而不是附加。

trans-unit.source: When using <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddWithKey" name="AddWithKey" href=""></xref>, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_AddWithKey" name="AddWithKey" href=""> </xref>，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>遺漏指定的資料行對應時產生。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
